page.title: 09My Everyday Life.
page.content: {ON MONDAY}afternoon I do my homework. I then go up to my shed with Sarah and we write books. I usually television all night after my dinner. {ON TUESDAY}afternoon Ido my homework. I then read 4 or 5 chapters of a book. At 18:45 I go to Guides. We do lots of things like Jumble Sales and go places.Guides start at 19:25 to 21:00. {ON WEDNESDAY}afternoon I do my homework and read for a little while. At 18:00 I call for Sally Taylor and we go to band practice. I play a trumpet and so does Sally. You have to blow hard so that you get a good sound. {ON THURSDAY}afternoon i do my homework and watch television. At 18:30 I call for Sally and we go to band practice. {ON FRIDAY}afternoon i do my homework. I usually have a bath for 1 or 2 hours.
